sprite

Class ImageScalar

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.ImageScalar

  • public class ImageScalar
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for simplifying BufferedImage modification. Is created by default with every sprite object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageScalar()

      Resizes the image based on a width and height inputed
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotateImageByDegrees(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img, double angle)
      Rotates the image given by the angle (in degrees) given

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getScaledImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                                   double scaleFactor)
        Creates and resizes an image based on the scale given
        Parameters:
        image - the BufferedImage intended to scale
        scaleFactor - The multiplier for the scale intended
        Returns:
        Resized image

      • resize

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage resize(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                           int newW,
                                           int newH)
        Resizes the image based on a width and height inputed
        Parameters:
        img - The BufferedImage intended to scale
        newW - The new width intended for the image
        newH - The new height intended for the image
        Returns:
        BufferedImage that is scaled with the parameters given

      • rotateImageByDegrees

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotateImageByDegrees(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                                         double angle)
        Rotates the image given by the angle (in degrees) given
        Parameters:
        img - The BufferedImage intended to rotate
        angle - The angle (in degrees) the rotation will happen
        Returns:
        Rotated instance of the image parameter

      • reflectImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage reflectImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)

        img - Image intended to be reflected
        Returns:
        reflected instance of image
